AD.name: URL
AD.description: The URL of the LDAP server of the form 'ldap://host:[port]'.

AD.name: Base DN
AD.description: The base DN of the LDAP directory. Example: dc=example,dc=com

AD.name: User Search Base
AD.description: The user search base of the LDAP directory. Example: ou=Users,ou=Accounts

AD.name: User Filter
AD.description: The attribute to filter users by id. Example: sAMAccountName

AD.name: Manager DN
AD.description: The DN of the manager account used for searches. Example: cn=manager,ou=Users,ou=Accounts,dc=example,dc=com
